content.question: In Old Manâ€™s Cloth, El Anatsui creates meaning by

choices.label: using recycled metal to create a work reminiscent of traditional fabrics
weaving Dutch wax fabrics together as a comment on contemporary fashion
welding tin cans to create a massive sculpture made of consumable materials
utilizing mass-produced textiles made by workers in Europe

content.answer: using recycled metal to create a work reminiscent of traditional fabrics

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
